bui-ajax
bui-ready
bui-checkVersion
bui-animate
bui-toggle
bui-inArray
template.value: var arr = ["a","b"], index = bui.inArray("a", arr);
template.description: 检测字符是否存在数组,返回索引

template.name: bui-indexArray
template.value: var arr = ["a","b","a"], index = bui.indexArray("a", arr);
template.description: 检测字符是否存在数组,返回所有索引的数组

template.name: bui-compareArray
template.value: var arr = ["a","b"], index = bui.compareArray(a, arr);
template.description: 检测字符是否存在数组,返回布尔值

template.name: bui-excessArray
template.value: var arr = ["a","b","a","c"], newArr = bui.excessArray("a", arr);
template.description: 去除数组的重复值,返回数组

template.name: bui-filterArray
template.value: var arr = ["a","b"], data = bui.filterArray("a",arr);
template.description: 过滤数组,返回符合条件的数组

template.name: bui-removeArray
template.value: var arr = ["a","b"], data = bui.removeArray("a", arr);
template.description: 删除数组的某个值,返回剩下的数组
